item.title: Report X-2025040174
item.description:
Report X-2025040174

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-01
  • City: CARLISLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Freight was loaded on beams in the trailer and fell off the beams in transit due to lack of blocking and bracing. The operations assistant advised that the freight was billed as two pallets of books, but advised that the freight appears to be Fuji Film plate developer replenisher in jugs in boxes showing corrosive 8. Safety advised CURA would be contacted for remediation.~~Called CURA and spoke with Lizzie who advised a crew would be sent out and will attempt to clarify details. ~~Cura advised the product to be UN1814, Potassium hydroxide, solution, 8, PG II.

item.title: Report X-2025040403
item.description:
Report X-2025040403

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-29
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: REPORTED TO DA. WEARING PROPER PPE USED THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUID. BOX WAS ON THE BELT SMALL WET SPOT ON THE SIDE OF THE BOX. NO LIQUID ON THE BELT NO NEED FOR ZEP ZORBENT. PLACED THE BOX IN A GREEN PLASTIC DMP BAG AND REMOVED IT TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report E-2025040038
item.description:
Report E-2025040038

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-26
  • City: York
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a drum that had been slightly punctured by a forklift blade by the top chime when it was originally loaded slightly leaking. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and the drum was repaired with drum putty and placed into a recovery container as well.

item.title: Report E-2025040030
item.description:
Report E-2025040030

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-18
  • City: GREENCASTLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A mechanic was replacing a placard holder on the side of a trailer and when drilling a hole in the side of the trailer to mount the placard holder they drilled through a drum that was staged inside of the trailer consequently puncturing it and contributing to the unintentional release. The drum was laid on it's side and repaired with drum putty and the spilled material was neutralized and cleaned with absorbent and placed in a recovery container as was the punctured drum.
